languages.text:
"Но {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}пиршество кошмаров наяву{/d}
Перо иное привнесло в сюжет.
Пусть и сокрыта личность драматурга,
Надеюсь, он услышит мой посыл:
Что даже у кошмаров есть кошмары,
И в них Ноктюрн Забвения звучит".
{n}Мрачный взгляд черных впадин глазниц рогатой маски надолго задерживается на вашем лице, прежде чем Арлекин продолжает свою речь.{/n}

"And yet the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}feast of waking nightmares{/d} draws
Another pen into this narrative.
The playwright's face remains a mystery,
But message mine I hope will reach those ears:
That nightmares suffer nightmares of their own,
Where Nocturne of Oblivion resounds."
{n}The black gaze of the horned mask's eye hollows lingers on your face before the Harlequin continues his speech.{/n}

languages.text:
「それなのに、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}悪夢から覚める祝宴{/d}を描くのだ
別のペンがこの物語に。
劇作家の顔は謎に包まれど、
私が望むメッセージは聴衆の耳に届くと信じよう。
あの悪夢は悪夢そのものに苦しむ悪夢、
忘却のノクターンが響く場所」
{n}角のついた仮面の眼孔が放つ黒いまなざしがあなたの顔に張りつくと、ハーレクィンは演説を続ける。{/n}
languages.original_text:
"And yet the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}feast of waking nightmares{/d} draws

{n}角のついた仮面の眼孔が放つ黒いまなざしがあなたの顔に張りつくと、ハーレクィンは演説を続ける。{/n}

languages.text:
“然而{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}白日梦魇的盛宴{/d}，
引来了另一支妙笔细说故事的因缘。
剧作者的面孔朦胧未现，
但愿他听到我此刻忠实的箴言。
梦魇亦有自己无法摆脱的梦魇，
只有遗忘的夜曲终日低徊盘旋。”
{n}丑角凝视你半晌，带角面具空洞的眼窝中射出两道暗沉沉的目光，继续开口道。{/n}
languages.original_text:
"And yet the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}feast of waking nightmares{/d} draws
Another pen into this narrative.
The playwright's face remains a mystery,
But message mine I hope will reach those ears:

traits.locale_text:
“然而白日梦魇的盛宴，
引来了另一支妙笔细说故事的因缘。
剧作者的面孔朦胧未现，
但愿他听到我此刻忠实的箴言。
梦魇亦有自己无法摆脱的梦魇，
只有遗忘的夜曲终日低徊盘旋。”
{n}丑角凝视你半晌，带角面具空洞的眼窝中射出两道暗沉沉的目光，继续开口道。{/n}

languages.text:
« Et pourtant, la {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}fête des cauchemars éveillés{/d} convoque
Une autre plume dans ce récit.
L'identité du dramaturge restera équivoque,
Mais mon message sera entendu tel un cri :
Les cauchemars aussi font de mauvais rêves,
Là où Nocturne de l'Oubli brandit son glaive. »
{n}Le regard noir derrière le masque cornu s'attarde sur votre visage avant que l'arlequin ne reprenne sa déclamation.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"And yet the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}feast of waking nightmares{/d} draws
Another pen into this narrative.

languages.text:
«Y aun con ello la {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}plétora de ensoñaciones{/d} atrae
una pluma más a esta narrativa.
El rostro del dramaturgo sigue siendo un misterio,
mas el mensaje mío espero que llegue a esos oídos:
que las pesadillas sufren pesadillas propias,
doquiera que resuene Nocturno del Olvido».
{n}La oscura mirada de los ojos huecos de aquella máscara cornuda se posa en tu cara antes de que el Arlequín continúe su discurso.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"And yet the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}feast of waking nightmares{/d} draws
Another pen into this narrative.
The playwright's face remains a mystery,
But message mine I hope will reach those ears:

{n}The black gaze of the horned mask's eye hollows lingers on your face before the Harlequin continues his speech.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
«Y aun con ello la plétora de ensoñaciones atrae
otra pluma a esta narrativa.
El rostro del dramaturgo sigue siendo un misterio,
mas el mensaje mío espero que llegue a esos oídos:
que las pesadillas sufren pesadillas propias,
doquiera que resuene Nocturno del Olvido».
{n}La oscura mirada de los ojos huecos de aquella máscara cornuda se posa en tu cara antes de que el Arlequín continúe su discurso.{/n}

languages.text:
"Und doch das {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}Fest erwachter Träume{/d} naht
Eine weit're Wendung der Geschichte.
Des Autors Gesicht bleibt ein Geheimnis,
Doch mein Wort verschafft sich gewiss Gehör:
Selbst Albträume plagen böse Träume,
Wo die Nocturne des Nichts widerhallt."
{n}Die leeren Augenhöhlen der gehörnten Maske ruhen auf deinem Gesicht, ehe der Harlekin seinen Vortrag fortsetzt.{/n}

"And yet the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}feast of waking nightmares{/d} draws

languages.text:
"Ancak belli eder ki {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}karabasanların gelişi{/d},
Bir başkası daha eline almıştır kalemi.
Piyesin yazarının kimliği korusa da esrarını,
İsterim o kulaklara müjdemin ulaşmasını:
Vardır her karabasanın da kendi karabasanı,
Yeter ki Nisyan Noktürnü çalsın enstrümanını."
{n}Boynuzlu maskesindeki karanlığa boğulmuş göz boşluklarını bir süre sana diken Arleken, konuşmaya devam ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text:
"And yet the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}feast of waking nightmares{/d} draws
Another pen into this narrative.
The playwright's face remains a mystery,
But message mine I hope will reach those ears:

traits.locale_text:
"Ancak belli eder ki karabasanların gelişi,
Bir başkası daha eline almıştır kalemi.
Piyesin yazarının kimliği korusa da esrarını,
İsterim o kulaklara müjdemin ulaşmasını:
Vardır her karabasanın da kendi karabasanı,
Yeter ki Nisyan Noktürnü çalsın enstrümanını."
{n}Arleken, boynuzlu maskesindeki karanlığa boğulmuş göz boşluklarını bir süre senin yüzüne diktikten sonra konuşmaya devam ediyor.{/n}
